item.title: About me
item.author: alexandersaaf95@gmail.com (Alexander Sääf)
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my small corner of this gigantic web of connections that we call the internet. It’s not a very large corner, but it’s where I hang out, and I kind off like it here. I hope you will too. I am a software development student from Sweden, and I spend my spare time developing videogames, currently with Unity. I am right now developing a platformer game for mobile called ‘Super Platformer’, which is currently in beta.

item.title: My projects
item.author: alexandersaaf95@gmail.com (Alexander Sääf)
item.description: This page is not yet finished, sorry!

item.title: Super Platformer on Google Play Store
item.author: alexandersaaf95@gmail.com (Alexander Sääf)
item.description: I have just released my first game ever on the Google Play Store! It is a small mobile platforming game where the player must make their way through rooms filled with dangers. The rooms are randomly drawn from a predefined set of rooms, and upon death the player needs to start over from the first room. The game might not be very large, but I am fairly happy with how it turned out!
